57
Data Models (II)
• Snowflake Data Model is a normalized 
structure for hierarchical representations. For 
each hierarchical level an entity is created. In 
this model each hierarchy node has a column 
linked to its parent node.

• 
Flattened Data Model, is a de-normalized 
structure.  The hierarchy is represented with a 
table where each hierarchical level is stored in a 
different column.
